text:
Wrestling with the weight of guilt

Nervous and frantic by the canal  
He can’t throw it away!  
“Too many people watching me!”  

---

Desperate for a solution  
The Neva seems safer.  
“Less crowded… I can do this.”  

“Why didn’t I think of this sooner?”  
“I must hurry before it’s too late!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist struggles with the difficulty of disposing of incriminating items while feeling increasingly paranoid and observed.
